bibl.title: J.-O. TJÄDER and K.A. WORP, Completio of a Deed of Donation.
bibl.note: Text acquired by the Bodleian Library in 1981. Ravenna, between 553 and 564 A.D.? Under the text, there are some names of persons living much later times [e.g. the Italian humanist Matteo Maria Boiardo (1441-1494)]; they may be taken to have owned the fragment, or to have left their signatures in order to show that they at least saw the fragment.
SALOMONS R.P., J.-O. TJÄDER and K.A. WORP, Completio of a Deed of Donation.
ZPE 123 (1998) pp. 151-157, 1 fig. et pl. III.
